attributes.action: When assessing barring UK entry scrutinise returning jihadists before D Trump.
attributes.background: How can it be that we remain silent over potential (re)entrants to UK who wish to carry out and incite acts of barbaric violence while at the same time singling out one individual however prominent, influential, outspoken or offensive ?

rejection.details: This petition seems to be about the request made by another petition (https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/114003), not about the policy of the UK Government.
